titleStmt.title: E. G. Spaulding et al. to James F. Robinson et al.
CWG7906

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p: The undersigned Members of the Thirty Seventh Congress of the United States having entire Confidence in the integrity ability and loyalty of William Fitch of Washington D C. take pleasure in recommending him to the Governors of our respective States for the appointment of Commissioner of Deeds for the Said States, for the District of Columbia.

Washington D. C. March 4. 1863
E G. Spaulding N. Y.
Burt Van Horn N.Y.
Alfred Ely N.Y.
R. B. Van Volkenburg N.Y.
Theodore Pomeroy N.Y.
R. E. Fenton N.Y.
S. W. Sherman N.Y.
Stephen Baker N.Y.
J. P. Chamberlin N.Y.
A. Frank N.Y.
A. P. Morrill Mo.
William Kellogg Ill.
Owen Lovejoy Ill.
T. D. Elliott Mass.
Amasa Walker Mass.
J. M. Ashley Ohio
V. B. Norton Ohio
J. H. Pierce Missouri
S. L.. Casey Ky.
J. H. Menzres Ky.
G. W. Dunlap Ky.
G. H. Yeamen Ky.
J. B. Blair Va.
Horace Maynard Tenn
F. G. Phelps Cal.
A. A. Sargent Cal.
J. T. Nixon N. Jersey
Geo P. Fisher Del.
William Windom Minn.
William Wall N.Y.
Benjamin Flanders La.
John A. Bingham Ohio
Schuyler Colfax Ind.

I hereby declare on
Oath that the above is a true copy of the original.

District of Columbia
County of Washington } S. S.
Sworn to and Subscribed before me this 12.th day of March A. D. 1863 and I hereby certify that the above affiant is a credible person.

D Rowland
Notary Public
DANIEL ROWLAND,
NOTARY
PUBLIC
WASHINGTON CO. D.C.

District of Columbia
Comr of Deeds
Wm Fitch
Washington City
App Mar 18th 1863
